title: [1508521049] 8 Rules All Cyclists Should Break | The GCN Show Ep. 248
description:
In this week's GCN show, we've got 8 rules that you should break, cobbles, close passes, and a descending masterclass with Vincenzo Nibali!

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/pV
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/pW

From the weight of your bike, to when you should wear a cycling cap, there are all sorts of laws and unwritten rules around cycling, but which ones should you break?

Cobbles, gravel, and Alpe D’Huez are reportedly on the menu for the Tour de France this year

Operation Close pass will not be implemented in Cambridgeshire due to narrow roads…

Find out what you’d all like to see on bikes in the future

We’ve got a big roundup of Il Lombardia, the final monument of the season. Although it could be renamed “Vincenzo Nibali really is the world’s best descender”!

An hour record and a husband & wife team win this week’s Wattage Bazookas

On Extreme Corner this week we’ve got footage from one of the hardest mountain biking events of the year, the Red Bull Hardline.

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link

Music:
Viper Creek Club -  Because I Know (Instrumental)

Jonas Erlander - Afternoon Swing 3

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
